title: 皐月賞の後に・次は絶対！

text_block_list.text: The winner is Mihono Bourbon. The goal of achieving the Triple Crown has also been shattered.
However, Matikanetannhauser remains positive, wanting to use today's race as a stepping stone and give it her all in the 'Japanese Derby'.
On the other hand, Rice Shower, who also suffered defeat, seems even more fired up, thinking 'I still have to keep pushing harder.'
The Classic-level races are far from over. The days of running full tilt continue, all leading up to the upcoming 'Japanese Derby'!
